Posts.Content: hi my father has cholangio carcinoma ,  have been reading a lot since diagnosis, so , according to my knowledge, this colon cancer has no curing possibility. recurrence possibility is too high and that has been occurred now in your case.  we gave 7 chemo cycles, my fathers case is inoperable, metastasis, its spread till omentum, we came across this person, CA CARE.ORG , DR.Chris teo, herbalist from penang, Malaysia. he doesnt cure, he teaches how to manage with herbals with lesser pain, symptoms and gives quality life to cancer patients. you can check in website, if you find this an option alternative to allopathy, please go and check the place, its ultimately your feel , and will power. do not hurt urself more and more with burning in allopathy. quality life doesnt mean soul has to burn in allopathy, it also means that there are natural, herbal, ayurvedic, homeopathy...and so on created again to these diseases. i felt that the malaysia thing will work , atleast no side effects, i wish my father to lead a quality life from now on.. sorry if i have hurted your feelings towards your treatment. but this kind of tumor, will have tendency for recurrence .. god blessings on you... take care. viji vignesh. India.
Posts.Title: PET Scan
